item.title: Democrats seek to block Homeland Security funding over ICE concerns
item.description: The spending bill is set for a vote Thursday, and it’s not clear if it will have enough support to pass.

item.title: House Oversight Committee votes to hold Clintons in contempt of Congress
item.description: Bill and Hillary Clinton have refused to meet with the committee regarding its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
